creditline: Gift of Samuel D. and Patricia N. McCullough
provenance: Pearson family, Chicago, Illinois; by descent to Sara Pearson Wells; (Peter H. Tillou Fine Arts, Litchfield, Connecticut, by 1991); Samuel D. and Patricia N. McCullough, Minneapolis, Minnesota, 1991 - 1998; gift to MIA on August 18, 1998.
title: Portrait of Harriet Brown
